README.md:
# ğŸ¬ All Video Downloader A modern, responsive web application for downloading videos from TikTok, YouTube, and Instagram. Built with React, TailwindCSS, and powered by Apify APIs. ## âœ¨ Features - **Multi-Platform Support**: Download from TikTok, YouTube, and Instagram - **High Quality Downloads**: Get videos in the best available quality - **No Watermark**: TikTok videos downloaded without watermark - **Dark/Light Mode**: Toggle between themes - **Responsive Design**: Works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile - **Real-time Processing**: Live download status updates - **Modern UI**: Clean, intuitive interface with smooth animations ## ğŸš€ Tech Stack - **Frontend**: React 18, TailwindCSS, Vite - **Backend**: Node.js, Express - **APIs**: Apify (TikTok, YouTube, Instagram downloaders) - **HTTP Client**: Axios ## ğŸ“¦ Installation 1. **Clone the repository**: ```bash git clone cd all-video-downloader ``` 2. **Install dependencies**: ```bash npm install ``` 3. **Start the backend server**: ```bash npm run server ``` 4. **Start the frontend development server**: ```bash npm run dev ``` 5. **Open your browser** and go to `http://localhost:5173` ## ğŸ”§ Configuration The Apify API token is already configured in the server. If you need to change it, update the token in `server/index.js`: ```javascript const client = new ApifyClient({ token: 'your-apify-api-token-here' }) ``` ## ğŸŒ API Endpoints ### POST `/api/download` Download a video from supported platforms. **Request Body**: ```json { "url": "https://www.tiktok.com/@user/video/123", "platform": "tiktok" } ``` **Response**: ```json { "platform": "tiktok", "title": "Video Title", "author": "@username", "thumbnail": "https://...", "videoUrl": "https://...", "duration": 30, "views": 1000000 } ``` ### POST `/api/info` Get video information without download links. ### GET `/health` Health check endpoint. ## ğŸ“± Supported Platforms | Platform | Features | Quality | |----------|----------|----------| | **TikTok** | âœ… No watermark
âœ… Original quality
âœ… Video metadata | HD | | **YouTube** | âœ… Multiple formats
âœ… Various qualities
âœ… Audio extraction | Up to 4K | | **Instagram** | âœ… Reels support
âœ… Posts & stories
âœ… High quality | HD | ## ğŸ¨ UI Features - **Responsive Design**: Optimized for all screen sizes - **Dark/Light Theme**: Auto-detection with manual toggle - **Smooth Animations**: CSS transitions and keyframes - **Loading States**: Real-time feedback during processing - **Error Handling**: User-friendly error messages - **Modern Gradient Buttons**: Platform-specific color schemes ## ğŸ“„ File Structure ``` â”œâ”€â”€ src/ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ components/ â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ Header.jsx â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ DownloadTabs.jsx â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ TikTokDownloader.jsx â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ YouTubeDownloader.jsx â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ InstagramDownloader.jsx â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ DownloadForm.jsx â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ VideoResult.jsx â”‚ â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ ThemeToggle.jsx â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ Footer.jsx â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ services/ â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ api.js â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ App.jsx â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ main.jsx â”‚ â””â”€â”€ index.css â”œâ”€â”€ server/ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ index.js â”œâ”€â”€ package.json â”œâ”€â”€ tailwind.config.js â””â”€â”€ README.md ``` ## ğŸš€ Deployment ### Frontend (Vercel/Netlify) 1. Build the project: `npm run build` 2. Deploy the `dist` folder 3. Update API base URL in `src/services/api.js` ### Backend (Railway/Heroku) 1. Deploy the server folder 2. Set environment variables 3. Update CORS settings for your domain ## ğŸ“ Environment Variables ```env PORT=3001 APIFY_TOKEN=your-apify-token CORS_ORIGIN=http://localhost:5173 ``` ## ğŸ›¡ï¸ Rate Limits The application uses Apify's rate limiting. For production use, consider: - Implementing request queuing - Adding user rate limiting - Caching frequently requested videos ## ğŸ¤ Contributing 1. Fork the repository 2. Create a feature branch 3. Make your changes 4. Test thoroughly 5. Submit a pull request ## ğŸ“„ License MIT License - see LICENSE file for details. ## ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Author **Ryzellx** - Full Stack Developer - GitHub: [@Ryzellx](https://github.com/Ryzellx) ## âš ï¸ Disclaimer This tool is for personal use only. Please respect the terms of service of each platform and ensure you have the right to download the content you're accessing. --- ## ğŸ†˜ Support If you encounter any issues or have questions: 1. Check the [Issues](../../issues) section 2. Create a new issue with detailed information 3. Include error messages and steps to reproduce Enjoy downloading your favorite videos! ğŸ‰
